body.p: The text of the unaccompanied standard, IFRS 13, is contained in Part A of this edition. The text of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 13 is contained in Part C of this edition. Its effective date when issued was 1 January 2013. This part presents the following documents:

ol.li:
APPENDIX
Amendments to the guidance on other IFRSs
